camera - Variable in class controller.Game
 
Camera - Class in view
Since the worlds are much larger than the window the game renders at any given time, a camera is needed to follow the player around to display a limited section of the world.
Camera(float, float) - Constructor for class view.Camera
Creates a new Camera with the given offsets.
Camera() - Constructor for class view.Camera
Creates a new Camera centered on the Player.

checkCollision(float, float) - Method in class entities.creatures.Creature
Checks in a specific direction if collisions are happening between the moving creature and other entities, or solid tiles, at the 3 closest tiles in front of the creature.
